name: Wizardia - Taking social gaming to the street!
blurb: Could it be true? Yes! Help us to connect real life with virtual world! Join us and let the adventure begin!

rewards.reward: Get an an exclusive desktop Wallpaper for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device. PLUS: we will include your name in the Official Credits of the game. Your name will be inserted into a special Wizardia Hall of Fame on our website. You will receive personal invitation to test closed beta version and you will have an opportunity to share your feedback with us. On top of all that, you will receive ingame currency worth of 20 USD for purchases in-game marketplace.

Get the awesome digital art book including production art and design sketches, the original soundtrack and desktop wallpaper. PLUS: You will receive 3 TOP SECRET crafting formulas. Each formula will let you to craft special, mystic and a very useful item. INCLUDES all previous rewards.

Get unique "Supporter Badge" which can be used on your blog, website or facebook profile. You will receive additional bonuses for each new player who will sign to the game using this badge. It will be a huge advantage to all our supporters. PLUS: You will receive 4 unique magic spells (fire, water, earth and sky). On top of all that you will get special poster - please add $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada. INCLUDES all previous rewards.

Your generous donation guarantees that you'll get not just the poster but a T-SHIRT designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign. Once it's over we won't be making any more! Please add $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada. INCLUDES all previous rewards.

Artefacts - a unique and unusually powerful magical items. Items will be extremely powerful and transferred only for Kickstarter backers. All artefacts will be designed exclusively for each backer. You will receive one artefact for each donation. If you have additional questions about this prize please contact us via email. INCLUDES all previous rewards.

Avatar - this is your chance to get in the game. We will prepare you your own avatar, designed exclusively according your directions. We will work with you and will personalize your avatar according your wishes. Everyone who plays the game will be able to see your uniqueness and power! Look to the left to check out the more information or if you have additional questions about this prize, please contact us via email. INCLUDES all previous rewards.

Barracks is one of the most important structure in the game. Player can recruit various battle units. You will receive exclusively designed Barracks which will produce additional and unique unit, designed just for you. Look to the left to check out the more information or if you have additional questions about this prize, please contact us via email. INCLUDES all previous rewards.
